definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Engine room machinery and equipment, electrical and automatic machinery.
sentences.chinese: 机房机械设备，电器及自动化机械。

sentences.english: An automatic software-development technique of interactive interface for intelligent instruments is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种智能仪表交互界面的软件开发自动化技术。

sentences.english: And it illustrates the larger trend of home automation that is catching on among do-it-yourselfers.
sentences.chinese: 这说明家庭自动化的大趋势就是自己动手。

sentences.english: The company has imported a complete set of automatic production lines and up-to-date technology.
sentences.chinese: 公司引进了自动化生产线的全套设备和先进技术。

sentences.english: Gated in the field of automation, ANNY will always walk at the forefront of the world.
sentences.chinese: 在自动化门控领域，ANNY将始终走在世界的前列。

sentences.english: NC/CNC technology is the foundation of realizing automation of manufacturing process.
sentences.chinese: 数控技术是实现制造过程自动化的基础。

sentences.english: Shanghai Deba Automation Technology Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 上海迪拜自动化技术有限公司。

sentences.english: This year's graduates with major in Automation Control or Electrical Engineering are also welcome.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎优秀的自动化控制或机电工程应届毕业生应聘。

sentences.english: The automated task that records data to the snapshots might not have run yet.
sentences.chinese: 将数据记录到快照上的自动化任务可能尚未运行。

sentences.english: Consider creating scripts to automate the regular maintenance of queue managers.
sentences.chinese: 考虑创建脚本来自动化队列管理器的定期维护。

sentences.english: The transducing levelling instrument can be used for automatic observation on deformation.
sentences.chinese: 传感水准器可在自动化观测变形中应用。

sentences.english: The appearance of C3I system is great evolvement of command roboticized.
sentences.chinese: C3I系统的出现是指挥自动化的重大进展。

sentences.english: Jibing Chen got both Bachelor's and Master degree from Beijing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics.
sentences.chinese: 他在清华大学获得自动化专业学士和硕士学位。

sentences.english: Shanghai BOWOO Automation System Equipment Co. , Ltd. Sino-foreign joint ventures. Located in the Qingpu District, Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 上海宝偶自动化系统设备有限公司中外合资企业。

sentences.english: Refactoring goes hand in hand with automated testing.
sentences.chinese: 重构与自动化测试是携手并进的。

definition: informatization (the Information Age analog of industrialization)
